Themes

ggplot2 themes for different contexts

Annenberg Institute Base Theme

Annenberg Institute Grid Theme

Color Scales

Discrete, continuous, and diverging scales using AIB brand colors

scale_color_aib() scale_colour_aib()
Discrete AIB Color Scale
scale_fill_aib()
Discrete AIB Fill Scale
scale_color_aib_c() scale_colour_aib_c()
Continuous AIB Color Scale
scale_fill_aib_c()
Continuous AIB Fill Scale
scale_color_aib_div() scale_colour_aib_div()
Diverging AIB Color Scale
scale_fill_aib_div()
Diverging AIB Fill Scale
